member.name: SHARDAPPIDINFOLINK
member.summary: Contains data used by to identify both an item, in this case through an , and the process that it is associated with.

member.name: SHARDAPPIDINFOLINK.psl
member.summary: Pointer to an instance that, when launched, opens the item. The shortcut is not added by to the user's Recent folder (CSIDL_RECENT, FOLDERID_Recent), but it is added to the Recent category in the specified application's Jump List.

member.name: SHARDAPPIDINFOLINK.pszAppID
member.summary: The application-defined AppUserModelID associated with the item.
